port.title: Port
port.description: Port on which to listen for incoming data

wendelin-ingestion-url.title: Wendelin ingestion URL
wendelin-ingestion-url.description: Ingestion endpoint URL of the Wendelin Telecom instance to which the data is to be forwarded

username.title: Wendelin account username
username.description: The username of a valid account to authenticate with on the Wendelin instance

password.title: Wendelin account password
password.description: The password of the account to authenticate with on the Wendelin instance
